original_text: And he lodged there that same night; and took of that which came to his hand a present for Esau his brother;
korean_text: 야곱이 거기서 밤을 지내고 그 소유 중에서 형 에서를 위하여 예물을 택하니

sentences.original_text: and took of that which came to his hand
a present for Esau his brother;
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 형 에서를 위한 선물을 취하였다
